mapper.insert: insert into book_type (typeId, parentId, parentName, typeName, typeCode) values (#{typeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{parentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{parentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{typeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{typeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
